Paris 1973 what we were faced with was
two supersonic airliners and there was
undoubtedly competition to see who could
put on the best flying display the last

Concorde with its maneuvers of turns and
passes
and then it was the turn of the tu-144
it climbed steeply before suddenly the
nose went down from the steep climb very
violently the aeroplane got quite close

heard quite a large number of people
have been killed on the ground because

many rumors as to what happened the
official story which nobody in the
business believed was that there was a
loose photographer in the cockpit and he
fell forward across the controls when
the aircraft leveled off from its climb
the French had a reconnaissance

especially to the tu-144 I think they
had unexpectedly seen this French

underneath it that was probably the
cause of the accident
after the accident I don't think the
